CHANGENAME.TITLE: Restriction Set Change Name
CHANGENAME.ERROR: Failed to change restriction set name

DISABLE.CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to disable this restrictions set?

ENABLE.CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to enable this restrictions set?

DELETE.CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete this restrictions set?

DELETERESTRICTION.CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete this restriction from the set?
DELETERESTRICTION.SUCCESS: Successfully deleted the restriction from the set

ADD.SUCCESS: Successfully added the restriction to the set
ADD.ERROR: Failed to add the restriction to the set

UPDATE.ERROR: Failed to update restriction on set

ADD.TITLE: Add a Restriction Set
ADD.DESCRIPTION: Use the controls below to setup a restriction set
ADD.ERROR: Failed to add the restriction set

DOMAIN.NAME: Domain
DOMAIN.DESCRIPTION: Choose the domain which you are creating the restriction for

NAME.NAME: Name
NAME.DESCRIPTION: Add a unique name for the restriction

RESTRICTION.NAME: Restriction
RESTRICTION.DESCRIPTION: Select the restriction to be applied

ENABLED.NAME: Enabled
ENABLED.DESCRIPTION: Enable this restriction in the set?
